snippet.title: Atari Lynx Longplay - Electrocop (OLD)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

A nice attempt to make a third-person game for the time it was released. But this game is really boring, even for that time. It's a maze where you need to go to level 5 through level 12, or I don't know, see it in the longplay. Also, those code breaker programs take way too long, because you should know the results before you enter the doors and use the code breaker, which I did, except for the last few doors I reached at the end, I simply typed the results, as it would really take too long.

at 00:38:38 I put what would happen if you kill the 'kidnapper' or the hostage at the end of the game (two different endings)
at 00:39:05 I added the funny game over screen after it. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
